short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that adds an option on Canvas to preview download links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whenever you click a file link on Canvas, it automatically downloads the file. This extension makes it so that if you right click on one of those links, you have the option of opening that link in a new tab and previewing the file before you download it, or without downloading it at all.
